20110120164546.000|20110120164547.000|CC1|THIS MORNING AMY GOODMAN OUR

20110120164549.000|20110120164550.000|CC1|FOR "SOUTHERN LIVING" MAGAZINE

20110120164551.000|20110120164553.000|CC1|TIPS THAT WE CAN ALL USE AROUND

20110120164555.000|20110120164556.000|CC1|>> WE'RE GOING TO START OFF WITH

20110120164558.000|20110120164559.000|CC1|COURSE, NOW THAT YOU'RE AT      
20110120164559.000|20110120164600.000|CC1|"SOUTHERN LIVING" MAGAZINE, THIS
20110120164600.000|20110120164601.000|CC1|IS THE STAPING OF SOUTHERN      
20110120164601.000|20110120164602.000|CC1|COOKING.                        
20110120164602.000|20110120164603.000|CC1|BUT MAN THEY CAN BE HARD TO     
20110120164603.000|20110120164603.000|CC1|CLEAN.                          
20110120164603.000|20110120164604.000|CC1|>> IT'S A CORNERSTONE OF        
20110120164604.000|20110120164606.000|CC1|SOUTHERN COOKING BECAUSE IT     
20110120164606.000|20110120164607.000|CC1|NATURALLY SEASONS YOUR FOOD.    
20110120164607.000|20110120164609.000|CC1|IT'S NONSTICK AND IT'S VIRTUALLY
20110120164609.000|20110120164609.000|CC1|INDESTRUCTIBLE.                 
20110120164609.000|20110120164610.000|CC1|HOWEVER, IT CAN BE A BEAR TO    
20110120164610.000|20110120164611.000|CC1|CLEAN.                          
20110120164611.000|20110120164611.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20110120164611.000|20110120164613.000|CC1|>> THE FIRST STEP IS YOU TAKE A 
20110120164613.000|20110120164615.000|CC1|WOODEN SPOON AND YOU GET UP AS  
20110120164615.000|20110120164617.000|CC1|MUCH OF THE FOOD AS YOU POSSIBLY
20110120164617.000|20110120164618.000|CC1|CAN NATURALLY THERE.            
20110120164618.000|20110120164619.000|CC1|AND I WANT TO DO THIS WHILE IT'S
20110120164619.000|20110120164621.000|CC1|STILL A LITTLE BIT HOT, RIGHT,  
20110120164621.000|20110120164622.000|CC1|SO THAT IT MOVES A LITTLE BIT   
20110120164622.000|20110120164623.000|CC1|EASIER?                         
20110120164623.000|20110120164624.000|CC1|>> YOU WANT THE PAN TO BE       
20110120164624.000|20110120164624.000|CC1|COMPLETELY COOL.                
20110120164624.000|20110120164625.000|CC1|>> OKAY.                        
20110120164625.000|20110120164626.000|CC1|>> AND THEN YOU DO THE SCRAPING.
20110120164626.000|20110120164628.000|CC1|THEN UNDER WARM WATER, USING NO 
20110120164628.000|20110120164630.000|CC1|SOAP, YOU TAKE A BRISTLE BRUSH  
20110120164630.000|20110120164632.000|CC1|THAT IS NOT METALLIC OR A GREEN 
20110120164632.000|20110120164634.000|CC1|SCOUR PAD AND YOU GO TO WORK AT 
20110120164634.000|20110120164635.000|CC1|IT.                             
20110120164635.000|20110120164636.000|CC1|THE KEY HERE IS THAT IT'S ABOUT 
20110120164636.000|20110120164637.000|CC1|THE ELBOW GREASE AND THE ENERGY 
20110120164637.000|20110120164639.000|CC1|THAT YOU PUT INTO IT.           
20110120164639.000|20110120164641.000|CC1|THEN YOU RINSE WITH WATER.      
20110120164641.000|20110120164643.000|CC1|YOU TOWEL DRY AND AIR DRY       
20110120164643.000|20110120164645.000|CC1|NATURALLY AND THAT REALLY,      
20110120164645.000|20110120164646.000|CC1|REALLY SHOULD WORK WHERE MOST   
20110120164646.000|20110120164647.000|CC1|CAST IRON SKILLETS.             
20110120164647.000|20110120164648.000|CC1|WHEN IT'S CLEAN YOU TAKE A      
20110120164648.000|20110120164649.000|CC1|LITTLE BIT OF VEGETABLE OIL,    
20110120164649.000|20110120164652.000|CC1|APPLY THAT TO A PAPER TOWEL AND 
20110120164652.000|20110120164653.000|CC1|RUN IT THROUGH THE INTERIOR OF  
20110120164653.000|20110120164655.000|CC1|THE PAN TO SEAL IN THE NONSTICK 
20110120164655.000|20110120164655.000|CC1|QUALITIES AND SEASONING.        
20110120164655.000|20110120164657.000|CC1|>> I KNOW YOU'RE NOT SUPPOSED TO
20110120164657.000|20110120164658.000|CC1|USE SOAP ON THIS AND I KNOW WE  
20110120164658.000|20110120164659.000|CC1|WANT A LITTLE BIT OF THAT

20110120164700.000|20110120164701.000|CC1|WHAT GIVES YOU THE FLAVOR, THE  
20110120164701.000|20110120164703.000|CC1|BUILD JUMP OVER TIME.           
20110120164703.000|20110120164704.000|CC1|BUT WHEN IT'S SO CAKED ON IS

20110120164705.000|20110120164707.000|CC1|DO, I TRIED BAKING SODA ONCE AND
20110120164707.000|20110120164709.000|CC1|I THINK I RUINED MY MAN.        
20110120164709.000|20110120164711.000|CC1|>> A NONABRASIVE CLEANSER THAT'S
